sentences.en: A muscle tear will leave a scar after healing.
sentences.cn: 肌肉撕裂复原后会留下疤痕。

sentences.en: Adrenalin was injected into the muscle.
sentences.cn: 往肌肉里注射了肾上腺素。

sentences.en: Avoid muscle strain by warming up with slow jogging.
sentences.cn: 先慢跑热热身，免得拉伤肌肉。

sentences.en: Dave pulled a back muscle and could barely kick the ball.
sentences.cn: 戴夫背部拉伤，几乎没法踢球。

sentences.en: Eisenhower used his muscle to persuade Congress to change the law.
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔用他的影响力说服国会修改了该项法律。

sentences.en: He suffered a pulled calf muscle.
sentences.cn: 他小腿肚肌肉拉伤。

sentences.en: he was determined to &B{muscle in on} the union's affairs.
sentences.cn: 他决意强行插手工会事务。

sentences.en: I've torn a calf muscle.
sentences.cn: 我拉伤了小腿肌肉。

sentences.en: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.cn: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

sentences.en: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.cn: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.en: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.cn: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.en: Rooney has pulled a muscle in his thigh and won’t play tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 鲁尼大腿肌肉拉伤，明天不能参赛了。

sentences.en: Scott's muscle atrophied, his leg became stunted, and he was left lame.
sentences.cn: 斯科特的肌肉萎缩，一条腿发育不完全，成了个瘸子。

sentences.en: The body is made up primarily of bone, muscle, and fat.
sentences.cn: 人体主要是由骨骼、肌肉和脂肪构成。

sentences.en: The researchers stimulated the muscle electrically.
sentences.cn: 研究人员用电来刺激那块肌肉。

sentences.en: The troopers followed behind, every muscle tensed for the sudden gunfire.
sentences.cn: 骑兵尾随其后，精神高度紧张以防突袭。

sentences.en: There are three types of muscle in the body.
sentences.cn: 体内有3种类型的肌肉。

sentences.en: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
sentences.cn: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

sentences.en: This can lead to bodily weakness and muscle wastage.
sentences.cn: 这样可能会导致身体虚弱和肌肉萎缩。

sentences.en: We were so tired we couldn't move a muscle.
sentences.cn: 我们累得动弹不得.

words.tran_cn: 肌肉的；肌肉发达的；强健的
肌肉组织；[解剖] 肌肉系统
加强；使劲搬动；使劲挤出

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（为获取利益）强行挤入（或插手）

trans.tran_en: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

trans.tran_cn: 加强；使劲搬动；使劲挤出
trans.tran_en: to use your strength to go somewhere
